description: Wraps an UTC timestamp with (optional) extended millisecond precision. Default value is Unix epoch (1990-01-01T00:00:00+00:00).
title: Timestamp

uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

seconds_since_unix_epoch.description: Number of seconds since Unix epoch

milliseconds.description: Number of milliseconds since the last second Value shall be between 0 and 999.

local_utc_offset_in_seconds.description: Local UTC offset in seconds (considering time zone and daylight saving) Value shall be between -43200 (-12:00) and 50400 (+14:00).
